com.audioord.web

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.audioord.web.RequestHandler

  • public class RequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class describes object, handle HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse extract from request command name and redirect to it

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RequestHandler()
      default constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doHandle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, javax.servlet.ServletContext ctx)
      There is handling service, which extract command name string from input request it's validate command name, in bad case logs error if command name is valid, it's extract Command object from Commands util class and execute it and forward to the corresponding page

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                     javax.servlet.ServletContext ctx)
        There is handling service, which extract command name string from input request it's validate command name, in bad case logs error if command name is valid, it's extract Command object from Commands util class and execute it and forward to the corresponding page
        Parameters:
        req - HttpServletRequest
        resp - HttpServletResponse
        ctx - ServletContext
